The claim is based on the closure of Bac: com, a classified ads website that was known for posting ads focused on sex.
Backpage: com was involved in 73% of all child trafficking reports received by the National Center for Missing and Exploited Children.
However: experts and researchers have raised doubts about whether Backpage.com can be considered the "world's largest human trafficking marketplace," as it is difficult to determine the size and scope of such a marketplace.
